data.title: API - Likes

data.desc: To make it easy to watch content in other sites.

data.title: Optimized Varnish Configuration
data.desc: To increase cache hit-rate on Varnish, I've optimized Varnish Configuration.

data.title: Solved Out of Memory
data.desc: Solved using Eclipse' Memory Analyzer(MAT). As the number of users increased, the back-end system has to be refactored. While CMS server read all of users, Out of memory has been occurred.
